TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed FieldDirection extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines identifiers used to indicate the direction of parameter and argument declarations.

remarks.format:
## Remarks FieldDirection allows for passing arguments to functions by reference, or using incoming or outgoing parameters.
## Examples The following example demonstrates use of FieldDirection to indicate the field direction types of the parameters of a method in a method declaration.
[!code-cs[CodeParameterDeclarationExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.codedom.fielddi_1.cs)] [!code-vb[CodeParameterDeclarationExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.codedom.fielddi_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[CodeParameterDeclarationExample#3](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.codedom.fielddi_1.cpp)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.FieldDirection In = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.FieldDirection Out = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.CodeDom.FieldDirection Ref = int32(2)
